data.text: @ThatEricAlper Or your addictions; victims don’t get and stay sober. RIP Mac Miller.
@ncrazy88 @ThatEricAlper Uhhh having addiction is partly on that person. He couldve checked himself into rehab. Ari tried to help him, but you cant help someone who wont help themselves

@ThatEricAlper Read ur earlier tweets & felt they were honorable.But, writing abt his death & analyzing his past relationship while speculating it may have played a part in his choice to be happy(or not)is click bait, feeding trolls & lazy #MacMiller had an addiction.2day, let's honor HIS gifts
@ThatEricAlper He struggle with addiction way before he meet Ariana.

@ThatEricAlper Why do we have to respect people who commit suicide.. if i were to commit suicide i would just do it cuz people are going to repect me... is that what you want???  ....commit suicide is sick.. grossing.. Mac Miller dont deserve respect.. people who cmmit suicede dont deserve resp
@dcheadle @ThatEricAlper U can’t be with someone if ur unhappy no matter how much they trusted u with their heart, and making someone feel guilty on top of grief is cruel
@veddergirl94 I posted a few tweets about him earlier. Go see. Someone’s cause of death does not negate their talent. In some cases, it makes me admire their talent more.
@ncrazy88 @ThatEricAlper We dont know his reason, it couldve been something else. Instead of attacking Ariana attack the person who sold him the drugs.

@ThatEricAlper I usually find ur posts thoughtful & interesting. Not 2day. Like most people, you r taking focus off #MacMiller & his talents & success. U just did that, too. I am sad for his family, his friends & his addiction. We will never know what could've come next #RIPMac
@ThatEricAlper There is a responsibility one has though if someone trusts you with their heart
@ThatEricAlper You also don’t know him enough to know if he actually killed himself... I.e.... bob marley, m.j
